item.description:
Join us for a sweet treat in between classes @ Rasa Yoga @ 7pm right before Community Yoga! Energize your workout! Chocolates & Body Butters for sale for your Beloved (be it yourself or another!) 

 

We are celebrating Valentine's in 2012 with the launch of the mamaLicious Edible Cacao Body Butter & Deliciously Decadent Raw Chocolates Infused with Superfoods & Love!

 

Check out all of our upcoming tastings for the month of February:

Feb 1st - Wilton, CT (private residence) - email Imani@mamaliciousmarket.com to RSVP

Feb 2nd - Rasa Yoga Studio @ 7pm, West Hartford 

free tasting in between classes; chocolates & body butters available for purchase 

Feb 3rd - First Friday Heartbeat Trance Dance @ Alchemy/Co-op 6pm-midnight

chocolates & body butters available for purchase 

Feb 4th - Passiflora from 1-3pm, New Hartford

free tasting in between classes; chocolates & body butters available for purchase

Feb 5th - Rawvolution @ 4pm, NYC

free tasting in between classes; chocolates & body butters available for purchase

Feb 7th - Glastonbury Naturopathic Center & Wholistic Spa

free tasting & mini superfood talk 5:30pm; chocolates & body butters & Valentine's spa packages available for purchase

Feb 8th - The Yoga Shop 7:30pm, South Windsor

free tasting in between classes; chocolates & body butters available for purchase

Feb 9th - Downtown Yoga Studio from 6-8pm, Hartford

Yoga & chocolate - special workshop! Must pre-register! Chocolates & body butters available for purchase

Feb 10th - Sexy Spirits Puja Ceremony, 8pm, NYC

Must pre-register for evening workshop

Feb 11th - Rasa Yoga Studio @ 4:30-6:30pm, West Hartford 

Special Valentine Partner Yoga & Chocolate - Pre-registration required. Chocolates & body butters available for purchase 

Feb 13-17th Sensual Detox - A Valentine's Day Celebration & Expression of Self-Loving with Imani & Lisl in upstate NY

an exploration of chocolate & more....you deserve it!

Feb 19th - CWG, 8pm, NYC

Cuddle Party & Chocolate - what could be better? A great Valentine's Day follow-up with dear friends Ran Baron & Monique Darling - Pre-reg required for full day workshop and/or evening event- message Imani for details.
item.name: MamaLicious CHOCOLATE TASTINGS with Imani
